hi,

I installed Cantera1.5.4 and Python2.3. When I tried to 
use ./configure at cygwin window. Then it says the following. 

Congifuration error. Python is required to build cantera, but it 
can't be found. Set evvironment variable PYTHON_CMD to the full path 
to the Python interpreter on your system and run configure again.

I don't know how to set PYTHON_CMD to full path to the Python 
interpreter on my system. Can anybody please help me? 


Thanks

rajesh
